newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania leu closes unchanged at 6,950/7,050 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Romania leu closes unchanged at 6,950/7,050 to dlr.

text.p: 1510 GMT - Romania's leu closed at 6,950/7,050 to the dollar on Thursday, unchanged from morning levels, on a quiet interbank market, operators said.
* Traders said hard currency owners were reluctant to sell and had adopted a wait-and-see attitude, expecting the leu to depreciate slightly and reach a more attractive exchange rate.
* The leu might slide to the 7,500/8,000 levels within a month, traders said.
* The central bank said the indicative rate of the leu was 7,032 to the dollar for Thursday.
* The money market operated with short-term prices at around 105 percent.
* Leu-dollar rates at retail shops hovered at around 6,550/6,900.
